text: Muhammad tali okugyako okuba nti Mubaka era nga Ababaka bonna abaamukulembera, kaakano bwaba afudde oba nattibwa olwo nga mukyukira ku bisinziiro byammwe (nemuva mu Busiraamu). Oyo yenna anaakyukira ku bisinziirobye talina kabi konna kaatuusa ku Katonda, era Katonda ajja kusasula abo abeebaza
